J For analysis, nee page 4. 5 To ascertain the number of vessels actually in the service of the Allies on the date of this return the number given underI. and IV". on page 2 must be included. In addition, a number of vessels shown under ore, phosphates, lead, &c, under(3) on page 4 load outward for an Allied Government. A comparison of the numbers shown under I. and IV. for the 8 months does not therefore give an accurate criterion of the vessels in Allied service at the different peiiods. T " Requisition " is here used to mean " requisition for full Government service." cp In "Requisitioned vessels" and "Vessels repairing (from Services in I.) " are included 100-408,156 G.T.
